product_name: Yakima KingJoe Pro 2 Bike Trunk Rack
long_description: All hail the Yakima KingJoe Pro 2 trunk bike carrier! Rugged steel construction solidly supports up to 2 bikes on the back of your car. Improved Quick Trigger Hub system features an easy-to-use large handle, making setup a breeze. Independent bike arm adjustment dials in the fit or folds arms down when not in use. The KingJoe Pro 2 is ideal for hatchbacks, vans and SUVs. Integrated StableCradles hold bikes firmly in place. Narrow bike arms fit your bike frame and ease loading. Large padded feet provide protection and stability; padded metal buckles protect vehicle finish. Retention straps ensure a rock-solid fit; reinforced steel cable glass hatch hooks are included for use on glass trunks or gate mounts. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: All hail the Yakima KingJoe Pro 2 trunk bike carrier! Rugged steel construction solidly supports up to 2 bikes on the back of your car.
